apiservice.name: Aesir E-Commerce - Product Webservice
apiservice.author: Aesir
apiservice.description: Maintain and translate products, which are used to catalog products across categories and companies.

create.description: This operation creates a new Aesir E-Commerce product

field.name: id
field.description: Product ERP ID. It will be stored as erp.<id> for future reference

field.name: name
field.description: Product name

field.name: alias
field.description: URL safe name. If omitted it will be auto-generated from the name

field.name: sku
field.description: Stock keeping unit, a unique identifier for each distinct product

field.name: manufacturer_sku
field.description: Manufacturer stock keeping unit

field.name: related_sku
field.description: Related stock keeping unit

field.name: date_new
field.description: Introduction date of this product, to display a NEW label in shop

field.name: stock_upper_level
field.description: When the stock is above this level, it's considered as enough stock. Below it, it displays a first warning

field.name: stock_lower_level
field.description: When the stock of this product is below this limit, a several warning is displayed in shop

field.name: template_code
field.description: Template selected for presenting the product in shop

field.name: company_id
field.description:
Owner company of this product - if null, it belongs to the main warehouse
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

field.name: category_id
field.description:
Main category of the product
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

field.name: manufacturer_id
field.description:
Product manufacturer
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

field.name: decimal_position
field.description: Decimal positions allowed for this product stock and purchase

field.name: filter_fieldset_id
field.description:
Product filter for shop
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

field.name: unit_measure_code
field.description: Code of the unit of measure of the product

field.name: price
field.description: Global product price, applied without any specification of customer, time or campaign. Fallback price

field.name: retail_price
field.description: Global product retail price, applied without any specification of customer, time or campaign. Fallback retail price

field.name: service
field.description: Defines if the product is a service/accessory product (true) or a regular product (false)

field.name: featured
field.description: When true, the product will be featured on main sections of the shop

resource.description: New internal product ID upon success, zero on error

list.description: This operation lists all Aesir E-Commerce products

field.name: id
field.description: Internal product ID

field.name: name
field.description: Product name

field.name: sku
field.description: Stock keeping unit, a unique identifier for each distinct product

field.name: manufacturer_sku
field.description: Manufacturer stock keeping unit

field.name: related_sku
field.description: Related stock keeping unit

field.name: template_code
field.description: Code of the template selected for presenting the product in shop

field.name: company_id
field.description: Owner company id

field.name: category_id
field.description: Main category of the product

field.name: manufacturer_id
field.description: Product manufacturer internal id

field.name: decimal_position
field.description: Decimal positions allowed for this product stock and purchase

field.name: filter_fieldset_id
field.description: Product filter for shop (internal ID)

field.name: unit_measure_code
field.description: Code of the unit of measure of the product

field.name: service
field.description: Defines if the product is a service/accessory product (true) or a regular product (false)

field.name: discontinued
field.description: When true, the product is considered as discontinued and cannot be sold anymore

field.name: featured
field.description: When true, the product will be featured on main sections of the shop

field.name: state
field.description: True if published, false if unpublished

field.name: previous_id
field.description: Filter products above an specific internal id

field.name: include_categories
field.description: When true, it populates the categories field with the ids of the categories of the product. Otherwise, the field will remain empty.

field.name: include_tags
field.description: When true, it populates the tags field with the ids of the tags of the product. Otherwise, the field will remain empty.

resource.description: Other valid IDs for the product
Stock keeping unit, a unique identifier for each distinct product
Introduction date of this product, to display a NEW label in shop
When the stock is above this level, it's considered as enough stock. Below it, it displays a first warning
When the stock of this product is below this limit, a several warning is displayed in shop
Code of the template selected for presenting the product in shop
Owner company ID of this product
Other valid IDs for the owner company
Decimal positions allowed for this product stock and purchase
Code of the unit of measure of the product
Global product price, applied without any specification of customer, time or campaign. Fallback price
Global product retail price, applied without any specification of customer, time or campaign. Fallback retail price
Defines if the product is a service/accessory product (true) or a regular product (false)
When true, the product is considered as discontinued and cannot be sold anymore
When true, the product will be featured on main sections of the shop
True if published, false if unpublished

Associated categories for this product (internal IDs).
By default this field is empty, but it will populate the URL when sending filter[include_categories]=true

Associated tags for this product (internal IDs).
By default this field is empty, but it will populate the URL when sending filter[include_tags]=true
Start displaying from a certain item in the list
Total number of pages of items
Limit the number of listed items
Sort list by field and direction

resource.linkTitle: Aesir E-Commerce - Filter Field Set Webservice
resource.description: Filter Field Set linked Web Service

item.description: This operation displays a single Aesir E-Commerce product

field.name: id
field.description:
Product ID.
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

resource.description: Other valid IDs for the product
Stock keeping unit, a unique identifier for each distinct product
Introduction date of this product, to display a NEW label in shop
When the stock is above this level, it's considered as enough stock. Below it, it displays a first warning
When the stock of this product is below this limit, a several warning is displayed in shop
Template selected for presenting the product in shop
Owner company ID of this product
Other valid IDs for the owner company ID of this product
Decimal positions allowed for this product stock and purchase
Code of the unit of measure of the product
Global product price, applied without any specification of customer, time or campaign. Fallback price
Global product retail price, applied without any specification of customer, time or campaign. Fallback retail price
Defines if the product is a service/accessory product (true) or a regular product (false)
When true, the product is considered as discontinued and cannot be sold anymore
When true, the product will be featured on main sections of the shop
True if published, false if unpublished
Associated categories for this product (internal IDs)
Associated categories for this product (other IDs - comma separated when multiple)
Associated tags for this product (internal IDs)
Associated tags for this product (other IDs - comma separated when multiple)
Collection of companies that can exclusively purchase this product (internal IDs)
Collection of companies that can exclusively purchase this product (other IDs - comma separated when multiple)

resource.linkTitle: Aesir E-Commerce - Filter Field Set Webservice
resource.description: Filter Field Set linked Web Service

update.description: This operation updates Aesir E-Commerce product

field.name: id
field.description:
Product ID.
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

field.name: erp_id
field.description: Set or update the Product ERP ID. It will be stored as erp.<id> for future reference

field.name: name
field.description: Product name

field.name: alias
field.description: URL safe name. If omitted it will be auto-generated from the name

field.name: sku
field.description: Stock keeping unit, a unique identifier for each distinct product

field.name: manufacturer_sku
field.description: Manufacturer stock keeping unit

field.name: related_sku
field.description: Related stock keeping unit

field.name: date_new
field.description: Introduction date of this product, to display a NEW label in shop

field.name: stock_upper_level
field.description: When the stock is above this level, it's considered as enough stock. Below it, it displays a first warning

field.name: stock_lower_level
field.description: When the stock of this product is below this limit, a several warning is displayed in shop

field.name: template_code
field.description: Template selected for presenting the product in shop. Send 'null' to remove it from the product.

field.name: category_id
field.description:
Main category of the product
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

field.name: manufacturer_id
field.description:
Product manufacturer
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

field.name: decimal_position
field.description: Decimal positions allowed for this product stock and purchase

field.name: filter_fieldset_id
field.description:
Product filter for shop
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

field.name: unit_measure_code
field.description: Code of the unit of measure of the product

field.name: price
field.description: Global product price, applied without any specification of customer, time or campaign. Fallback price

field.name: retail_price
field.description: Global product retail price, applied without any specification of customer, time or campaign. Fallback retail price

field.name: service
field.description: Defines if the product is a service/accessory product (true) or a regular product (false)

fields.description: Product update fields. Send the ID as a reference, and every other field will only be modified if sent, otherwise it will be ignored.

resource.description: Product internal ID upon success, zero on error

delete.description: This operation deletes Aesir E-Commerce product(s).

field.name: id
field.description:
Product ID.
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

resource.description: True upon success, false on error

publish.description: This task enables you to set specific products as published. Expected data: id of the product

field.name: id
field.description:
Product ID.
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

resource.description: Internal product ID upon success, zero on error

unpublish.description: This task enables you to set specific products as unpublished. Expected data: id of the product

field.name: id
field.description:
Product ID.
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

resource.description: Internal product ID upon success, zero on error

setPrice.description: This task enables you to set the global (fallback) price for the product.

field.name: id
field.description:
Product ID.
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

field.name: price
field.description: Global product price, applied without any specification of customer, time or campaign. Fallback price

resource.description: Internal product ID upon success, zero on error

setRetailPrice.description: This task enables you to set the global retail price for the product.

field.name: id
field.description:
Product ID.
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

field.name: retail_price
field.description: Global product retail price, applied without any specification of customer, time or campaign.

resource.description: Internal product ID upon success, zero on error

pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
